org.metaborg.spoofax.shell.commands

Interface ICommandInvoker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpoofaxCommandInvoker

    public interface ICommandInvoker
    An interface for binding and executing IReplCommands.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IReplCommand commandFromName(String commandName) 
      String commandPrefix() 
      default String ensureNoPrefix(String optionallyPrefixedCommandName)
      Ensure that the given parameter is returned without the commandPrefix().
      IReplCommand evaluationCommand() 
      default void execute(String optionallyPrefixedCommandName)
      Execute the IReplCommand which is bound to the given command name, minus the prefix.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluationCommand

        IReplCommand evaluationCommand()
        Returns:
        The command executed for evaluation.

      • commandFromName

        IReplCommand commandFromName(String commandName)
                      throws CommandNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        commandName - The name of an IReplCommand.
        Returns:
        The IReplCommand bound to commandName.
        Throws:
        CommandNotFoundException - when the command could not be found.

      • commandPrefix

        String commandPrefix()
        Returns:
        The prefix of the IReplCommands. The IReplCommands are stored without this prefix.

      • ensureNoPrefix

        default String ensureNoPrefix(String optionallyPrefixedCommandName)
        Ensure that the given parameter is returned without the commandPrefix().
        Parameters:
        optionallyPrefixedCommandName - An optionally prefixed command name.
        Returns:
        The command name without prefix if found. Otherwise just the same String as the argument

      • execute

        default void execute(String optionallyPrefixedCommandName)
              throws CommandNotFoundException
        Execute the IReplCommand which is bound to the given command name, minus the prefix.
        Parameters:
        optionallyPrefixedCommandName - The name of the IReplCommand to be executed.
        Throws:
        CommandNotFoundException - when the command could not be found.
